participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and sensitive, often struggles with anxiety.
participant_1.background: I faint at the sight of blood. I have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. I dye my hair every three months. I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Practical and straightforward, with a touch of sarcasm.
participant_2.background: They are constantly on my back. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I work too. I have a part time job at Burger King.

content.text: I dye my hair every three months.
I do not drink or do drugs or anything.
I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents home.
I work too. I have a part time job at Burger King.
I went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.
They are constantly on my back.
I faint at the sight of blood.
I do not know why, but I am very curious about you. I am not sure why.
What is it about me that interests you?
I do not know. There is just something about you that I find intriguing.
I am not sure what to say to that.
You do not have to say anything. I just wanted to tell you that I think you are interesting.
No problem. I am glad to make you happy.
